list.item: 09 May 2004 Syd Bauman: Removed duplicate entry for one conference call and put another back in order.
03 Mar 2004 Syd Bauman: Deleted editionStmt; added DOCTYPE declaration, made valid (corrected case of divgen); added entry for 2004-01 conference call.

body.p: This section of the web site is restricted. It contains information relating to the TEI Technical Council, and their procedures.

list.item: The council held a telephone conference call on 2004; see notes from the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 2 July 2004; see notes from the meeting.
The council met in Gent, 13-15 May 2004; see minutes of the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 29 Mar 2004; see notes from the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 27 Jan 2004; see notes from the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 23 Sep 2003; see notes from the meeting.
The council met in Oxford, 15-17 May 2003; see minutes of the meeting
The council held a telephone conference call on 18 March 2003; see notes from the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 21 January 2003; see notes from the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 26 November 2002; see notes from the meeting.
The council held a telephone conference call on 24 June 2002; see notes from the meeting.
The first meeting of the TEI Council was held January 12th 2002, at Kings College London: see minutes of the meeting.

div.head: Conference call information
div.p: TEI Council Conference calls are managed by Perry Willett, who has put together some useful information on the subject.

div.head: Constitution and Membership of the Council
div.p: The Constitution of the Council is defined in Article VI.2 of the Consortium Bylaws.
Its current membership is listed, along with that of the TEI Board, in the TEI Membership Prospectus
